definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is a part of their sexuality, not a partner replacement.
sentences.chinese: 這是他們性生活的一部分，性伴侶替代不了的。

sentences.english: "Women's sex-partner numbers are dependent on things other than attractiveness, " Thornhill told LiveScience.
sentences.chinese: 女性性伴侶的數量取決於除了吸引力之外的一些東西。

sentences.english: Breaking with traditional gender patterns is especially important when children are involved.
sentences.chinese: 當孩子捲進來時，與傳統性伴侶一刀兩斷非常重要。
而兩國結婚的同性伴侶。

sentences.english: We both think it’s dangerous to return to Venezuela as a same-sex married couple.
sentences.chinese: 我們都覺得作爲同性伴侶回到委內瑞拉會很危險。

sentences.english: What makes them physically desirable to each other?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼認爲對方是個不錯的性伴侶？

sentences.english: We just know the number of partners.
sentences.chinese: 我們只知道性伴侶的數目。

sentences.english: One even caters to couples with children.
sentences.chinese: 其中1家更是歡迎同性伴侶帶着他們的孩子一起前往。

sentences.english: They also said the hospital's general visitation policy does not discriminate against same-sex couples.
sentences.chinese: 管理人員還說醫院的探視規定是不會歧視同性伴侶的。

sentences.english: Imply the kind of sexual partner they might want.
sentences.chinese: 或者假裝他們想要的性伴侶暗示暗示。

sentences.english: But the exact number itself is altogether different.
sentences.chinese: 但是性伴侶的確切數量本身完全是兩碼事。

sentences.english: In New York City 823 same sex couples were granted licenses to marry on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 紐約市在週日授予八百二十三對同性伴侶結婚證書。

sentences.english: How to avoid sexual partners, to Clean.
sentences.chinese: 避免有多個性伴侶，要潔身自好。

sentences.english: Life misconduct, a lot of sexual partners, there are many high-class friends.
sentences.chinese: 生活不檢點，性伴侶一大堆，有許多高階層的朋友。

sentences.english: Most sadists seek to dominate a willing, submissive sexual partner.
sentences.chinese: 大多數性施虐癖追尋的是一個樂意臣服的性伴侶。

pinyin: bo2 qi3 gong1 neng2 zhang4 ai4

definition: medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
